name: Lost One
description:
A game made for our last assignment in Level Design and Visual Programming at Lasalle College! We're a team of 5 students currently enrolled in the Game Design Program there, and this is the first game we made mostly from scratch(using the Unreal 5 TopDown template). 

It was made, on the side, to participate in the OpenGameArt.org's Summer Game Jam 2022(https://itch.io/jam/opengamearts-summer-game-jam-2022), which required the use of some assets from their site! We uploaded our own, by Mathilde, for public use!

Author: Mathilde_Lea

Title: Low Poly-

Wolf: https://opengameart.org/content/low-poly-wolf-0

Rat: https://opengameart.org/content/low-poly-rat-0

Rabbit: https://opengameart.org/content/low-poly-rabbit

Fox Cub: https://opengameart.org/content/low-poly-cub

Bear: https://opengameart.org/content/low-poly-bear

Fox: https://opengameart.org/content/low-poly-fox

License: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

The UI was custom made, as well as the VFX, level design, animations, programming and some other 3D models by the team! The rest we took from the Unreal Marketplace, which is also full of very good low price(or free!)assets to get started with.

Main Menu Music: A Rising Sun — Alan Ellis

Background Music: 

Ittekimasu — Mandala Dreams

Spirit Of Fukushima — Mandala Dreams

Sumimasen — Calm Shores

All SFX are from Epidemic Sounds.

Feel free to leave us reviews(maybe it'll get us an A hehe)but mostly, we hope you enjoy our little game!
